title: I stopped using flipkart, 10 years back, when they refused to refund defective JBL headphones. They were/are complete scammers selling defective products on their website!!
comments: https://imgur.io/IMQCx5i is the OC posted by me 10 years ago!
Is this post like celebrating 10 year break-up anniversary ??
It tells you a lot about a company on how they treat customers! 10 years is incidental.
So you stopped using Flipkart due to one scammer seller?
